title: Barbra: The Music ... The Mem'ries ... The Magic!
synopsis: Iconic songstress Barbra Streisand culminates her 13-city tour in Miami with dazzling ballads, Broadway standards and stories from behind the scenes.

title: Eddie - Strongman
synopsis: British strongman Eddie Hall wants to be the strongest man in the world. This documentary reveals the grueling life choices that fuel his obsession.

title: Golden Time
synopsis: In the 1980s, a recently discarded television set from the 1960s refuses to accept its fate and tries to break out of the junkyard.

title: Aquarius
synopsis: The final holdout in her historic beachside building in Brazil, a retired music critic refuses to sell her apartment to developers bent on demolition.

title: 100 Metros
synopsis: A man who is diagnosed with multiple sclerosis responds by training for an Ironman triathlon, with his cranky father-in-law's help.

title: Train to Busan
synopsis: As a zombie outbreak sweeps the country, a dad and his daughter take a harrowing train journey in an attempt to reach the only city that's still safe.

title: Let There Be Light
synopsis: Some returning combat veterans suffer scars that are more psychological than physical. This film follows patients and staff during their treatment.

title: The Natural
synopsis: A gifted baseball player whose life has taken some startling turns becomes a 35-year-old rookie who helps a cellar-dwelling team get back in the game.

title: Derren Brown: The Push
synopsis: Mentalist Derren Brown engineers an audacious social experiment demonstrating how manipulation can lead an ordinary person to commit an appalling act.

title: Denis Leary: No Cure For Cancer
synopsis: In the stand-up performance that made him a legend, comedian Denis Leary caustically holds forth on nonsmokers, vegetarians and other undesirables.

title: Mission Control: The Unsung Heroes of Apollo
synopsis: Combining archive footage with present-day interviews, this documentary explores how Apollo's mission control helped change the course of history.

title: The Distinguished Citizen
synopsis: Worried he’s lost his artistic edge, a wealthy expat novelist returns to his backwater hometown in Argentina, where he’s regarded as a local hero.

title: Ice Guardians
synopsis: This film explores the controversial role of ice hockey 'enforcers,' as well as the physical and mental price paid by the game's notorious tough guys.

title: Gour Hari Dastaan: The Freedom File
synopsis: A former freedom fighter is forced to navigate the corridors of a disinterested bureaucracy to prove that he fought in India's freedom movement.

title: Happy Family
synopsis: A family’s festive Halloween plans take a spooky turn when an evil witch's curse transforms the costumed clan into actual monsters.

title: The Aerial
synopsis: In the City Without a Voice, only faceless singer the Voice can still vocalize. Everyone else has lost the power of speech as they let Mr. TV's broadcasts speak for them. But when Mr. TV kidnaps the Voice, things change.

title: Eric ldle's What About Dick?
synopsis: In a madcap stage play from Monty Python icon Eric Idle, comic greats perform the decline and fall of the British Empire ... as told through a piano.

title: Suckseed
synopsis: When his boyhood crush Ern returns, Ped forms a band with his friend to impress her. Romantic rivalries bloom after the talented Ern joins the group.

title: Secret
synopsis: Enchanted by a pretty pianist and the haunting melody she plays, a musical prodigy falls in love. But a secret soon threatens to derail their romance.

title: Hondros
synopsis: Photographer Chris Hondros put his life on the line to cover world conflicts. His best friend explores the stories behind his most impactful images.

title: Socha Na Tha
synopsis: An arranged marriage becomes a friendship for Viren and Aditi, who aren't in love -- until they begin having unexpected feelings for each other.

title: What We Started
synopsis: DJs and industry insiders offer a backstage pass to the world of electronic dance music, reflecting on its radical origins and the future of the genre.

title: Bareilly Ki Barfi
synopsis: When she falls in love with the author of a novel she adores, bohemian Bitti enlists the help of a local printer to find her new object of affection.

title: City of Joy
synopsis: Women who've been sexually brutalized in war-torn Congo begin to heal at City of Joy, a center that helps them regain a sense of self and empowerment.

title: Komola Rocket
synopsis: As the lives of rich and poor passengers aboard a steamship unfold, buried secrets, lustful affairs and selfish desires are exposed.

title: The Gospel of John
synopsis: In the first of four word-for-word film adaptations, Aramaic-speaking actors re-create the stories of Jesus' life from the fourth gospel.

title: Asees
synopsis: When a dispute breaks out between five siblings over their mother’s property, one devoted son will go to any lengths to protect her land.

title: They’ll Love Me When I’m Dead
synopsis: Actors, crew members and others who were there discuss the tumultuous creation of Orson Welles's final, unfinished film, “The Other Side of the Wind.”

title: The American Meme
synopsis: Social media stars Paris Hilton, Josh Ostrovsky, Brittany Furlan and Kirill Bichutsky hustle to build online empires -- and face the pitfalls of fame.

title: Aggretsuko: We Wish You a Metal Christmas
synopsis: While Retsuko desperately makes plans for Christmas Eve, her new obsession with seeking validation through social media spirals out of control.

title: John Leguizamo's Latin History for Morons
synopsis: In this one-man Broadway show, John Leguizamo finds humor and heartbreak as he traces 3,000 years of Latin history in an effort to help his bullied son.

title: Taramani
synopsis: A traditional man and an independent woman share a connection, but they must learn to navigate their vastly different experiences and expectations.

title: Rudy Habibie
synopsis: A biopic that explores the hardships and triumphs of the early life of B. J. Habibie, a transformative president of Indonesia.

title: Transformer
synopsis: Powerlifter Matt Kroczaleski faced his greatest challenge when he came out as transgender. This documentary captures his transition into a woman.

title: Jeff Dunham's Very Special Christmas Special
synopsis: Politically incorrect, sometimes raunchy ventriloquist Jeff Dunham is joined by his irreverent cast of characters in this hilarious Christmas special.

title: That Thing Called Tadhana
synopsis: A devastating breakup with her boyfriend may be the start of a new beginning for Mace, thanks to an adventurous and kind stranger named Anthony.

title: The Rolling Stones: Olé Olé Olé! A Trip Across Latin America
synopsis: Follow the Rolling Stones as the iconic group breaks new ground in Latin America, wrapping a 10-city tour as the first-ever rock band to play in Cuba.

title: Nate Bargatze: The Tennessee Kid
synopsis: Comic Nate Bargatze touches on air travel, cheap weddings, college football, chocolate milk and the perils of ordering coffee in this stand-up special.

title: Invader Zim: Enter the Florpus
synopsis: When Zim reappears to begin the next phase of his evil alien plan to conquer Earth, his nemesis Dib Membrane sets out to unmask him once and for all.

title: Rajnigandha
synopsis: A grad student leaves her boyfriend in Delhi for a job interview in Mumbai, where she reconnects with an old flame for whom she still has feelings.

title: Dream/Killer
synopsis: This riveting crime doc follows Bill as he confronts America's broken judicial system after his son is falsely sentenced to 40 years in prison.

title: Seth Meyers: Lobby Baby
synopsis: SNL alumnus and subversive master of late-night TV Seth Meyers comes out from behind the desk to share some lighthearted stories from his own life.

title: Shelby American
synopsis: Featuring interviews and vintage footage, this documentary traces American icon Carroll Shelby's life of reinvention from farmer to racer to entrepreneur.

title: The Sky Is Pink
synopsis: After succumbing to her terminal illness, a teenager posthumously narrates her parents’ tenacious relationship in this drama based on a true story.

title: Amar Akbar Anthony
synopsis: Abandoned in a park by their father, Amar, Akbar and Anthony grow up independently and have no knowledge of one another. They're reunited as adults when, by coincidence, they all give blood at the same hospital.

title: Road to Sangam
synopsis: As communal violence erupts in his neighborhood, a Muslim mechanic presses forward to repair a historic truck that will transport Gandhi’s last remains.

title: The Dark Side of Life: Mumbai City
synopsis: Struggling with Mumbai's pressures and private battles with depression, six lives intersect just as they reach a breaking point.

title: The Queen
synopsis: From wartime drafts to evening gowns, this candid time capsule documents a 1967 beauty pageant that offers an inside look at competitive drag.

title: Posesif
synopsis: A student diver risks her scholastic future and relationship with her father when she dates a moody transfer student consumed by their romance.

title: The Wicker Man
synopsis: Pious detective Neil Howie gets more than he bargained for when he probes a young girl's disappearance in this harrowing psychological thriller.

title: The Other One: The Long Strange Trip of Bob Weir
synopsis: This chronicle of Bob Weir highlights his brotherhood with Jerry Garcia and his success as a member of one of the world's most influential bands.

title: InuYasha: The Movie 4: Fire on the Mystic Island
synopsis: Ai, a young half-demon who has escaped from Horai Island to try to help his people, returns with potential saviors InuYasha, Sesshomaru and Kikyo.

title: Taylor Tomlinson: Quarter-Life Crisis
synopsis: She's halfway through her 20s — and she's over it. Too old to party, too young to settle down, comedian Taylor Tomlinson takes aim at her life choices.

title: Equilibrium
synopsis: In a dystopian future, a totalitarian regime maintains peace by subduing the populace with a drug, and displays of emotion are punishable by death.

title: Even the Rain
synopsis: While making a film about the incursion of Christopher Columbus in the New World, a director finds the Bolivian locals protesting modern exploitation.

title: The Short Game
synopsis: They are fiercely competitive athletes, determined to become champions on one of the world's toughest golf courses. And they're still in grade school.

title: The Black Godfather
synopsis: This documentary follows the life of Clarence Avant, the ultimate, uncensored mentor and behind-the-scenes rainmaker in music, film, TV and politics.

title: Marc Maron: Thinky Pain
synopsis: Alternative comic Marc Maron is back on stage in New York to talk Chinese food, drug abuse, sex in hotel rooms and life with his girlfriend.

title: Back to the Future Part III
synopsis: The final installment of the trilogy finds Marty digging the trusty DeLorean out of a mineshaft and looking up Doc in the Wild West of 1885.

title: Babel
synopsis: When an American couple vacationing in Morocco falls victim to a random act of violence, a series of events unfolds across four countries.

title: Forgotten
synopsis: When his abducted brother returns seemingly a different man with no memory of the past 19 days, Jin-seok chases after the truth behind the kidnapping.

title: Kevin Hart: Laugh at My Pain
synopsis: Sometimes edgy and always hilarious, comedian Kevin Hart shines in this theatrical version of his record-breaking 2011 live tour.

title: Blue Valentine
synopsis: As Cindy and Dean muddle through their languishing marriage, they hearken back to the golden days when life was filled with possibility and romance.

title: Limitless
synopsis: With his writing career dragging, Eddie Morra finds his life turning around after he takes a drug that provides astonishing mental focus.

title: From One Second to the Next
synopsis: Werner Herzog chronicles the devastating consequences of texting and driving. The film examines how lives can be forever altered by a trivial text.

title: 20 Feet from Stardom
synopsis: Winner of the 2014 Academy Award for Best Documentary Feature, this film takes a look at the world of backup vocalists and the legends they support.

title: Bleach the Movie: Hell Verse
synopsis: When a group of vicious Sinners plots to escape from this eternal prison in Hell, they discover that Substitute Soul Reaper Ichigo is the key to their freedom. The Sinners launch an attack and in the process kidnap Ichigo's younger sist...

title: Guzaarish
synopsis: After an onstage disaster leaves an illusionist paralyzed, he channels his magic into a hit radio show. Years later, he fights for the right to die.

title: Mud
synopsis: Two Mississippi teens meet peculiar drifter Mud and get caught up in his web of tall tales about lost love, crimes of passion and bounty hunters.

title: Adam: His Song Continues
synopsis: After their child was abducted and murdered, John and Reve Walsh fought to raise national awareness of the problem of missing children.

title: Steal a Pencil for Me
synopsis: This moving documentary chronicles the unshakeable romance between a couple who met and fell in love while imprisoned in a Nazi concentration camp.

title: Triumph of the Heart
synopsis: This drama tells the tale of Ricky Bell, a pro running back with the Tampa Bay Buccaneers who died of a muscle disease in the prime of his career.

title: The Ryan White Story
synopsis: After contracting HIV from a tainted blood treatment, teenaged hemophiliac Ryan White is forced to fight for his right to attend public school.

title: Once Upon a Time in Mumbaai
synopsis: After working his way up from humble beginnings, respected gangster Sultan reigns over Mumbai's underworld with honor and compassion. But when Sultan's wild protégé, Shoaib, challenges his power, the criminal landscape...

title: Tig
synopsis: Comedian Tig Notaro announced her cancer diagnosis at what became a legendary stand-up set in 2012. Follow her search for humor amid devastating news.

title: Kabhi Khushi Kabhie Gham
synopsis: Businessman Yash and his wife, Nandini, love their sons, but Yash disowns his adopted son, Rahul, after he marries a woman of lower social standing.

title: Trailer Park Boys: Countdown to Liquor Day
synopsis: After their latest jail stint, boozy pals Julian, Bubbles and Ricky plan to go legit but learn trailer park manager Jim aims to demolish their homes.

title: Five Elements Ninjas
synopsis: When the Five Element Ninjas -- whose fighting styles are based on the natural elements of gold, wood, water, fire and earth -- unleash their fury on a rival school, lone survivor Shao Tien-hao vows deadly revenge.

title: Suburra
synopsis: A grueling battle over turning a seaside town near Rome into a gambling paradise exposes criminal rivalries and endemic corruption on a grand scale.

title: Tyke Elephant Outlaw
synopsis: This documentary recounts a 1994 incident in Honolulu in which a circus elephant attacked and killed its trainer, then ran loose on the city streets.

title: Tootsie
synopsis: Few actors go as far to bag a part as Michael Dorsey, who transforms himself into a woman to prove he can get hired as a soap opera star.

title: Yuva
synopsis: An accident on a bridge ties together three young men from different social classes, sparking a course of events that will forever alter their lives.

title: Starred Up
synopsis: A British juvenile offender's violent temper gets him transferred to an adult prison, where he encounters his estranged father.

title: Organize Isler
synopsis: A gang leader recruits a suicidal Superman impersonator, while a woman driving a hot car linked to the gang plots revenge against them and their hero.

title: Elizabeth
synopsis: This Oscar-winning treatise on absolute power and its human toll sees fledgling queen Elizabeth I sacrificing happiness for her own safety.

title: Palm Trees in the Snow
synopsis: Finding a tantalizing clue in an old letter, a young woman journeys to her family's tropical plantation to uncover generations of secrets.

title: Russell Howard: Recalibrate
synopsis: Self-deprecating comic Russell Howard plows ahead through politics, porn, social media and his own shortcomings. Yet he somehow keeps it positive.

title: The Last Man on the Moon
synopsis: Astronaut Gene Cernan looks back on the exciting history of NASA's lunar landings and how being the last man to stand on the moon changed his life.

title: APEX: The Story of the Hypercar
synopsis: A visionary carmaker introduces his fuel-efficient, high-performance hypercar to a market filled with big-name competitors like Ferrari and Porsche.

title: Holding the Man
synopsis: In 1970s Australia, two teen boys fall in love with each other and defeat obstacles to their 15-year relationship, until a new crisis comes their way.

title: Hokkabaz
synopsis: Trying to resurrect his career, not-so-talented magician Iskender goes on tour, but things get iffy when one of his illusions works a little too well.

title: Beauties of the Night
synopsis: Back in the days of disco, Mexico had its own stars of the night. This documentary casts new light on former queens of the Mexican burlesque scene.

title: Mudbound
synopsis: Two Mississippi families -- one black, one white -- confront the brutal realities of prejudice, farming and friendship in a divided World War II era.

title: Divines
synopsis: A shrewd teenager and her wisecracking best friend plan to get rich or die trying by following in the footsteps of a flashy female drug dealer.

title: Peepli Live
synopsis: Two indigent farmers consider suicide so that their families can collect a government subsidy that's paid to the relatives of deceased farmers.

title: Sadece Sen
synopsis: An ex-boxer falls in love with a blind woman and starts to build a new life, but his violent past returns to endanger them both.

title: Gabriel lglesias: I’m Sorry For What I Said When I Was Hungry
synopsis: Hawaiian-shirt enthusiast Gabriel 'Fluffy' Iglesias finds the laughs in racist gift baskets, Prius-driving cops and all-female taco trucks.

title: Garfunkel and Oates: Trying to be Special
synopsis: Garfunkel and Oates put on a surprise-filled show in Seattle in hopes of raising enough money to make their own comedy special.

title: Mike Birbiglia: Thank God for Jokes
synopsis: Comedian Mike Birbiglia takes the stage in Brooklyn and hits on hard truths about puppets, late people and the very real dangers of being funny.

title: Howards End
synopsis: When a husband, acting in his family's 'best interest,' does not accept his wife's deathbed wish, providence dictates that he pay for his duplicity.
